divs: Sighting DetailsOut on porch smoking, I noticed a very bright flash, some noise however allot of back ground noise unable to determine exact noise.... If this was an aircraft it must have been traveling above super sonic speed... I was looking to the north toward hill airforce base, object was aproxamatly 80,000 feet or above.... No I'm not crazy I've worked around aircraft for many years. Light was very unusual ..
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Layton
There were no other sightings in Layton on or around March 1st 2011
Summary: Quick bright flash much much brighter than stars. I may of heard a plane noise however object never appeared again and I had a good view of the sky
